text: Xinghesaurus is the informal name given to a Sauropod dinosaur from China. It was a herbivore or plant-eater. It was named in 2009 in the book "Miracle of Deserts".Hasegawa et al. (2009). "Dinosaur Expo 2009: Miracle of Deserts". (guide book) It was probably around long and weighed around . == References == Category:Sauropods Category:Cretaceous dinosaurs
title: Xinghesaurus
